question: The "Xalala Hydroelectric Dam" is a proposed dam of Guatemala. It will be constructed across which river?
explanation: The Xalala Hydroelectric Dam is a proposed dam that will span the Chixoy River in the municipality of Ixcan in Guatemala. The US$ 400 million dam's hydroelectric power station will have an installed capacity of 181 MWe, generating an estimated 886 GWh of electricity per year.
